name: Augmented Reality - Drawing From a Jewish Archive
name_original: Augmented Reality - Drawing From a Jewish Archive
description:
This project is a little bit different. How to publish and distribute AR content?

The download contains the Targets needed to make this software work, rather than the software itself. You need:

1. a device with a camera and an internet connection to open this link (either tapping or scanning the QR code.

 https://river-fountain.glitch.me/

 

2. Either printed out or on a second device, display the target images. The small black squares must be visible for the program to work. 

The targets can either be downloaded and printed, found lower in this description, or be found on the project webpage: 

http://singingstranger.com/2019/06/26/augmented-reality-drawing-from-a-jewish-archive/

3. Once the program over the link has opened, aim your camera at the targets. Enjoy!

The Targets:

For more information on the project, click here:

 http://singingstranger.com/2019/06/26/augmented-reality-drawing-from-a-jewish-archive/

This project was made with AR.js
